result.eng: I was ill, so I could not go to school.

result.eng: If you transfer to a different job you can still keep the allowance.

result.eng: We cannot bring it in because of how big it is.

result.eng: I can't talk to you, I'm too busy.

result.orig: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar
result.html: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbótharYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a ċloig a ċaiṫeaṁ ar an mbóṫarYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.

result.eng: Can you wait a minute?
result.ga: An féidir leat fanacht nóiméad
result.orig: An féidir leat fanacht nóiméad
result.html: An féidir leat fanacht nóiméadCan you wait a minute?
result.ponchtml: An féidir leat fanaċt nóiméadCan you wait a minute?

result.eng: I'm sorry, but I cannot come.
result.ga: Tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíocht
result.orig: Tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíocht
result.html: Tá aiféala orm ach ní féidir liom tíochtI'm sorry, but I cannot come.
result.ponchtml: Tá aiféala orm aċ ní féidir liom tíoċtI'm sorry, but I cannot come.

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag an scéal naċ féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ga: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.orig: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.html: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bithIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: I saol dorċa na spiaireaċta ní féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte de rud ar biṫIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.

result.eng: It cannot be denied that mathematics has a beauty.
result.ga: Ní féidir a shéanadh go bhfuil áilleacht ag an matamaitic
result.orig: Ní féidir a shéanadh go bhfuil áilleacht ag an matamaitic
result.html: Ní féidir a shéanadh go bhfuil áilleacht ag an matamaiticIt cannot be denied that mathematics has a beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir a ẛéanaḋ go ḃfuil áilleaċt ag an matamaiticIt cannot be denied that mathematics has a beauty.

result.eng: At the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
result.ga: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthú
result.orig: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthú
result.html: I ndeireadh an lae ámh ní féidir na líomhaintí seo a chruthúAt the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.
result.ponchtml: I ndeireaḋ an lae áṁ ní féidir na líoṁaintí seo a ċruṫúAt the end of the day, though, these accusations cannot be proven.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
